column5: Dewaim etc.) is one of the largest cities along the White Nile in Sudan.

column1: Ed Dueim is on the west bank of the White Nile
It is home to the University of Bakht
column2: which lies to the north of the town.

column1: The university has played an important role in promoting education throughout Sudan. It is known for its two-year course called Al Sanatain
column2: which prepared teachers to teach school
column3: attracting students from all regions of Sudan and neighbouring countries.

column1: Ed Dueim has a hot desert climate (Köppen climate classification BWh).
